thread.title: Suly Belber

author: Suly Belber
title: Suly Belber
text:
Very friendly, turned up between the time frame given. Fitted the tyre in 15 minutes.
I would 100% use your services again should the need arise.
May I sayI have been Quote: d Â£160.00 elsewhere to fit the tyre on and that price included me taking my vehicle to the mechanics. Not only you Quote: dme a lot cheaper price for the original tyre, came round to my home and fitted also for a cheaper price. Fantastic!
